thread.title: BRIEF-FGL Holdings Announces Proposed Notes Offering

title: BRIEF-FGL Holdings Announces Proposed Notes Offering
text:
April 16, 2018 / 1:31 PM / Updated 6 minutes ago BRIEF-FGL Holdings Announces Proposed Notes Offering Reuters Staff 
April 16 (Reuters) - FGL Holdings: * FGL HOLDINGS ANNOUNCES PROPOSED NOTES OFFERING 
* FGL HOLDINGS - UNIT PLANS TO OFFER APPROXIMATELY $550 MILLION AGGREGATE PRINCIPAL AMOUNT OF SENIOR NOTES DUE 2025 
* FGL HOLDINGS - EXPECTS TO USE PROCEEDS OF OFFERING TO REPAY $135 MILLION OF BORROWINGS UNDER REVOLVING CREDIT FACILITY, OTHER USES 
* FGL HOLDINGS - EXPECTS TO USE NET PROCEEDS OF OFFERING PARTLY TO REPAY $135 MILLION OF BORROWINGS UNDER ITS REVOLVING CREDIT FACILITY AND RELATED EXPENSES Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
